FuncDef: The display ifit flow-cache command displays IFIT flow table information. The display ifit flow-cache command displays IFIT flow table information. This command is supported only on the CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
CLIs: display ifit flow-cache [ { tcp | udp } | sip <ipv4-sip-address> | dip <ipv4-dip-address> | srcport <srcport-number> | dstport <dstport-number> | status { active | aged } | flow-id <flow-id-number> ] slot <slot-id>

display ifit flow-cache [ { tcp | udp } | sip <ipv6-sip-address> | dip <ipv6-dip-address> | srcport <srcport-number> | dstport <dstport-number> | status { active | aged } | flow-id <flow-id-number> ] slot <slot-id>

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates source IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Indicates source IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number in the format X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Indicates destination IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Indicates destination IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number in the format X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies the source port.
The value is an integer in the range of 0 to 65535.

Specifies the destination port number.
The value is an integer in the range of 0 to 65535.

Sets the flow table status to active.
-

Indicates that the flow table is aged.
-

Specifies a flow ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1099511627775.

Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.
